mean_en: happening at a good time because of luck
word_etyma: pro 向前，在前 + vid 看 + ent...的 + ial 具有...的 → adj.神意的;幸运的
short_phrase: It's providential to get three cherries.
sentence: Finally, through some providential twist of fate, I won the jackpot! I'm rich!
sentence_trans: 经过一些神意的命运的扭转，我终于赢了头奖！我发啦！
